subject: Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: ... Hmm.. a lot like the SUnit way to do it: self should: [someThing doSomethingThatShouldThrowMyException] raise: MyException except that it s nicer in
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Ilja Preuss" <preuss@d...> wrote:
> We are currently trying something along the lines of
>
> public void testForException() {
> assertThrows(MyException.class, new Block() {
> public void execute() throws Exception {
> doSomethingThatShouldThrowMyException();
> }
> });
> }

Hmm.. a lot like the SUnit way to do it:

self should: [someThing doSomethingThatShouldThrowMyException] raise:
MyException

except that it's nicer in Smalltalk.

Dave
